alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 21 at 2:33AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Locally Dense Fog Developing Over Parts of the Treasure Coast... At 230 AM, surface observations, traffic cameras and reports from local traffic managers indicated locally dense fog was starting to develop around the greater Vero Beach and Fort Pierce areas. VISIBILITIES were occasionally dropping as low as one half mile. If you wil be driving in this area, especially along I-95 and the Florida Turnpike, prepare to encounter rapid reductions in visibility. If you encounter dense fog, reduce your speed, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you. There is the potential for the fog to become more dense and widespread through sunrise, which would necessitate the issuance of a Dense Fog Advisory.
